com.soen6441.core.tower

类 TowerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen6441.core.tower.TowerManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IArchive

    public class TowerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IArchive
    This class responds to manage towers. Such as, create, upgrade, etc. This class uses dom4j to read XML files.
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    作者:
    Haiyang Sun
    另请参阅:
    TowerManagerFactory, Tower

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TowerManager

        public TowerManager(java.lang.String towerType,
                    java.lang.String filePath)
        Constructor of TowerManager. Call analyze method to generate all levels of a particular type of tower.
        参数:
        towerType - The string use to defines a special type of tower.
        filePath - The string use to define a file path of TowerManager.
        另请参阅:
        analyse()

    • 方法详细资料

      • analyse

        public void analyse()
        This method is used to read and analyze files that store tower information. Get an XML element to decode.

      • decode

        public void decode(org.dom4j.Element towerManagerElement)
        All levels of tower object will be generated by this method and will be put in leveledTower list.
        指定者:
        decode 在接口中 IArchive
        参数:
        towerManagerElement - Element
        另请参阅:
        IArchive

      • encode

        public org.dom4j.Element encode()
        This method is used to convert value of properties of a particular class to an XML data element.
        指定者:
        encode 在接口中 IArchive
        返回:
        Element
        另请参阅:
        IArchive.encode()

      • createTower

        public Tower createTower()
        Create a specific Tower object. This method uses copyTo method of tower class.
        返回:
        Tower
        另请参阅:
        Tower.copyTo(Tower)

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(Tower tower)
        This method is used to upgrade an existing tower. This method uses copyTo method of tower class.
        参数:
        tower - a Tower object
        另请参阅:
        Tower.copyTo(Tower)

      • canUpgrade

        public boolean canUpgrade(Tower tower)
        Check whether the tower is in its highest level, if it is, return false, else return true; To use this method should call from tower
        参数:
        tower - an existing tower
        返回:
        boolean
        另请参阅:
        Tower.canUpgrade()
